name: Eat the Turkey
description:
Eat the Turkey is my first ever platformer. It is Thanksgiving themed. The goal is to get to the turkey at the end of each level. There is 12 levels + a super tall extra level!

I made almost all of the assets myself, other than a few, because I used some default unity stuff and blips/bloops from sfxr.me

For the best experience, I suggest downloading the Windows build.
